main event: On Thanksgiving Day, 23 November 1950, a Major saw four bright white circular objects at Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
interesting points: The objects were brilliantly white and about 3/4" in diameter., The first object ascended to a great height while turning over and over., Another object passed over quickly in level flight and disappeared to the NE., One of the objects appeared to have an antenna., The weather at the time of observation was clear with no clouds.
sighted object: four white circular objects in the sky
witness description: Major and Captain of the USAF
